dialogues.speaker: WITH SCAR AND SIMBA
dialogues.text: The hyenas pulverize Simba. Scar finally shouts an order: “SCAR Enough! The hyenas immediately stop and part down the center. Scar cooly walks through the parted crowd -- toward Simba who is weakened by his injuries and dangerously near the edge of the promontory. Simba struggles to keep from sliding off the rock to his death. Loose stones give way, causing him more trouble. Scar looms in for the kill.

dialogues.speaker: SCAR
dialogues.text: Poor pathetic Simba. Ever since you were a cub, wherever you went, disaster followed.
